plot: The boys have bought an Oculus Rift virtual reality headset and don't know who is in the real world or stuck in virtual reality.

In this SUPER mind twisting adventure, the boys buy an Oculus Rift. But as usual, things start to get strange. The boys start to realize that they are stuck in virtual reality And Can't find out which of them is the one using the oculus rift. They Are stuck in VIRTUAL REALITY! ... or are they?—Eli Coleman
